recommendations.name: hardCodedSecret
recommendations.desc: Ensure that the secret is not hard-coded

recommendations.name: httpOnlyFlag
recommendations.desc: Ensure that the httpOnly flag is set for applications that do not need access to the cookie, e.g Angular

recommendations.name: secureFlag
recommendations.desc: Ensure the 'secure' flag is set to prevent sessions sent over HTTP

recommendations.name: sameSiteFlag
recommendations.desc: Ensure the sameSet flag is set with 'strict' or 'relaxed'

recommendations.name: path
recommendations.desc: Ensure the path is set to '/'

recommendations.name: cookiePrefixes
recommendations.desc: Ensure the cookie name beings with a cookie prefix __Host or __Secure

recommendations.name: memoryStore
recommendations.desc: Ensure that the store is not the default 'Memory' store as this can be problematic for memory exhaustion and other security issues
